text: Hari Singwala is a town located in the Punjab province of Pakistan. It is located in Faisalabad District at 31°21'0N 73°3'0E with an altitude of 166 metres (547 feet) and lies near to the city of Lahore.Location of Hari Singwala - Falling Rain Genomics Neighbouring settlements include Sahibnagar to the east and Pollard Kot to the north. ==References== Category:Populated places in Faisalabad District
title: Hari Singwala
